name: 30934-海外公共关系及推广经理/资深经理 Manager/Senior Manager of Public Relations and Promotion
duty:
We are looking for a Senior Public Relations (PR) and Promotion Manager to organize and global PR strategy and ensure effective communication with internal/external stakeholders including global medias and the public, be part of the important strategy of the Global Games Publishing Business in Tencent.
As a Senior PR Manager, you should be an organized professional who is able to handle a crisis. We expect you to have a creative mind and excellent communication skills. If you are also confident in your public speaking and project management abilities, we’d like to meet you. Your goal will be cultivating a positive product and brand image for Tencent Games.
This is a full-time position based at Tencent headquarters in ShenZhen, China.

Key Responsibilities
•	Establish and maintain relationships with consumer, community, employee, and public interest groups.
•	Writing press releases and other media communications to promote products and brand. Prepare and distribute press releases. 
•	Planning or directing the development of programs to maintain favorable public and stakeholder views of the organization's agenda and accomplishments.
•	Studying the organization's objectives, promotion activities, and needs to build public relations strategies that influence public opinion and promote products, ideas, and services.
•	Conferring with managers to identify trends and group interests and providing advice on communication decisions.
•	Monitoring media coverage and prepare regular evaluation reports. Addressing inquiries from the media and other parties. 
•	Tracking media coverage and follow industry trends.
•	Responding to the media during crisis PR events or negative incidents, managing PR issues.
require:
Qualifications
•	Experience managing international media relations (online, broadcast and print).
•	Experience handling a press conference.
•	Ability to work on big strategic plans as well as day-to-day tasks.
•	Project and budget management skills.
•	Understanding of social media and solid experience working with agencies.
•	Knowledge of marketing communication.
•	Ability to pitch to international media and agencies.
•	Ability to run global PR campaigns that deliver measurable results and meet objectives.
•	Deadline-oriented, inquisitive, with great follow-up and reporting skills.
•	Creativity in securing coverage and buzz with online outlets.
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
•	Ability to think both creatively and strategically.
•	Creativity and problem-solving aptitude.
•	Responds well under pressure with the strict time limit.
•	Quick and enthusiastic learner.
•	Proficient in MS Office and international social media.
•	BSc/BA in Public Relations, Journalism, Communications or a related field.
•	Bilingual in English and Chinese.
•	Knowledge of additional languages other than English is a plus.

name: 30934-海外社群内容策略关系管理经理 Community Strategy Manager（深圳总部）
duty:
The role will work closely with internal teams as well as external parties to define and drive international community management strategy for Tencent Games, its franchises and products, be part of the important strategy of the Global Games Publishing Business in Tencent.
You will plan, define and deliver clear community strategy for all game titles with regards to Tencent Games and work with relevant parties to accomplish goals set by those parties. This is a full-time position based at Tencent Global Headquarters in ShenZhen, China.
Key Responsibilities:
• Be an one-stop community strategy boutique, able to define, plan, and iron out community strategies across the global market, ensuring its consistency with Tencent Games global strategy.
• Devise plans, clear goals, and strategies around specific areas of community management: social media, influencer management, content strategy and more.
• Establish a strong working relationship with the development and marketing teams within Tencent to optimize synergies and efficiencies.
• Working closely with and supporting User Acquisition, Design, and Marketing teams to align with their strategy and become more efficient with delivering value to all game teams.
• Ensuring strong and regular communication to all internal teams with clear updates on a consistent basis.
• Plan and organize workload across the team, giving regular synchronization of information and clearly
defining next steps of strategy creation.
• Analyze and deliver insightful reports in regard to competitor activity, growth, monitoring, and learnings that
can be extracted from each of them and be applicable to Tencent products in the shortest period possible.
require:
Knowledge, Skills and Experience
• 3+ years’ experience with strong and demonstrable track record within games, technology or entertainment industry.
• Strong relationships with partners, agencies and other third-party companies.
• Excellent written skills, including internal communication and presentation skills.
• Team player with outstanding communication skills. Comfortable with handling ambiguity and collaborate
across different functional teams and departments.
• Have an entrepreneurial spirit and be self-starter, including the ability to work independently and
autonomously.
• Ability to consistently deliver quality results under pressure, working and influencing decisions of various
stakeholders.
• Ability to travel as needed and required by the company to accomplish certain goals set in those plans.
• Quick and enthusiastic learner.
• Proficient in MS Office and international social media.
• BSc/BA in Public Relations, Journalism, Communications or a related field.
• Bilingual in English and Chinese is a plus.

name: Senior Cloud Solutions Manager
duty: •	Become a Subject Matter Expert (SME) in the Tencent Cloud Services Platform •	Remove Sales obstacles by providing internal consulting, training, and knowledge support •	Partner with Sales to build long-term account relationships, that deliver ongoing business value •	Develop Tencent Cloud based demonstrations, and solutions that successfully meet customer requirements •	Collaborate with internal Product and Engineering teams to diagnose and resolve problem cases •	Contribute to solution design, technical documentation, and compete awareness within the Solutions Team
require: •	Bachelor degree (or higher), with exposure to computer science, math, engineering, or equivalent practical experience •	5+ years’ experience in a Solutions Engineering or Pre/Post-Sales role, or demonstrated success in a related field •	Experience with physical and virtualized infrastructure, operating systems, and software configuration •	Experience with CDN/web caching, large file download, HTTP headers, and HTTP debugging tools •	Exposure to DNS, load balancing, HTTP web applications, mobile apps, and live streaming (audio/video) •	Experience in A/B testing, HTTP application and network performance analysis, and technical report writing •	Awareness of cloud compute cost models, network topology, platform services, and common storage option •	Awareness of Amazon Web Services (AWS), Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and other cloud providers •	Overall technical savvy with demonstrated ability in work in a small team setting, owning complex technical projects with international scope •	Experience managing and collaborating on long-term implementation projects, with documented results •	Lateral and logical troubleshooting, follow-through and problem-solving skills, resourcefulness, attention to detail, and communication skills

Proven ability to grow revenue and manage accounts Knowledge of Cloud, CDN , SaaS industry and internet space Experience analyzing data, trends and the market to develop key selling points

duty: Responsibilities:   •	Record transactions into the General Ledger, including banking activity, credit/debit card, reconcile bank statement and record related activity on a daily basis. •	Perform balance sheet account reconciliation to ensure integrity and accuracy of the financial statements, such as accounts payable, Fixed Assets, Cash, Prepaids, Accrued expenses, etc.  •	Drive to generate invoices for Tencent Cloud monthly in QuickBooks, and distribute invoices to clients. •	Track and process payments timely and accurately, and comply with internal controls, policies, and procedures. •	Take the lead of resolving invoice and payment issues with internal and external parties  •	Review and process employee reimbursable expenses through payment system.  •	Prepare monthly accrued expenses schedules and records related journal •	Manage vendor payments and generate maintenance of payable to ensure accurate and timely cash disbursements. •	Keep track of accounts receivable and transactions, follow up with Account Manager for any outstanding invoices, address customer issue and questions.  •	Generate monthly payment collection report to HR, and bi-monthly invoice outstanding report to Tencent Cloud team. •	Monthly reconcile Cloud revenue with Oracle system. •	Perform Ad-hoc financial duties as assigned.
require: Requirements:   •	BS or BA in economics, accounting, finance, business or equivalent experience. MBA preferred.  •	Minimum of 2-3 years of relevant experience in Accounting or Finance. •	Proficient with Excel and other planning tools.  •	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.  •	Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced, startup environment.  •	Experience working with offshore teams a plus.  •	Fluency in English and Mandarin (verbal and written).

duty: •	Qualified lawyer with over 5 years PQE, preferably received training at a top local firm or international firm •	Your keen interest and good understanding of developments in the FinTech/ Technology space. •	Experience in dealing with issues relating to international businesses. •	Must have strong financial regulatory (payments preferred) experience. •	Excellent problem solving, analytical and organizational skills. •	Proactive approach and able to handle matters independently. •	Open to gain exposure in various areas of law, including cloud, privacy and technology in general. •	Sound interpersonal and communication skills. •	Excellent written and spoken English •	Candidates with Chinese (Mandarin) skills is preferred.

name: Research Scientist in NLP/Machine Learning
duty: •	Development of novel algorithms and working prototypes / demos based on Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Deep Learning / Machine Learning techniques •	Create solutions related (but not limited) to information extraction, automated question answering, and reasoning using structured / unstructured clinical data and biomedical literature, and other sources •	Staying abreast on the existing literature to align, compare and contrast with the state-of-the-art techniques and algorithms •	Prepare manuscripts for top quality AI / Machine Learning / NLP / Healthcare conferences and journals •	Seizing opportunities to apply for internal and external research grants •	Working closely with universities, scientific institutions, academic organizations and governmental resources in the capacity of collaborative relationships as needed
require: •	Ph.D. in Computer Science or related fields •	Expertise in Artificial Intelligence (Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing) •	Experience in Knowledge Graph, Information Extraction •	Proficiency in Python or Java programming languages •	Experience in Database (SQL, NoSQL, etc.) •	Experience working in Unix/Linux environments •	Experience with deep learning tools and frameworks (e.g. Keras, TensorFlow, Torch, PyTorch, Theano, Caffe etc.) •	Ability to work within a team environment, and should be a quick learner and self-motivated with the ability to plan and execute •	Ability to communicate effectively, both written and verbal •	Familiar with clinical NLP along with medical terminologies and ontologies (e.g. ICD 10) and data standards (e.g., FHIR, HL7, DICOM) is a strong preference •	Experience in working with multi-modal and multi-source clinical data is a strong plus •	Strong track record of scientific publications and presentations in top-tier scientific conferences •	Proficiency in software engineering and architecture is a strong plus •	Ability to bridge communication gaps between clinical practice and computer science along with an understanding of patient care workflow in a variety of clinical settings is a strong plus

name: Director/ Sr. Manager, Business Development
duty: Identify and source new AAA quality licensing and partnership opportunities within the US for Tencent Games. Build senior-level relationships with game developers and publishers from the PC and console gaming space. Prepare and present proposals to internal management teams. Negotiate complex licensing contracts while working cross-functionally with internal management, finance, legal, and product teams. Travel, as necessary, to both US and international locations, as a representative of Tencent Games.
require: This role is part of the Global Publishing Team of Interactive Entertainment Group at Tencent. The team acts as the bridge between external developers and the internal operations team, helping to bring the best games to our platform, develop go to market strategies, and enable our publishing organization to deliver against our ambitious business goals. To do this, we build strong relationships with major AAA developers and publishers like Activision Blizzard, EA or Take Two.  The Business Development Director/Sr. Manager will be a key player in identifying new game licensing and partnership opportunities in the US for Tencent Games. The role will require communication across functional teams and requires an individual who is proactive, not afraid to get his/her hands dirty, and is comfortable navigating through complex environments.

Travel, as necessary, to both US and international locations, as a representative of Tencent Games.
